summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6647 for the improvement of THE ALLEY in BLOCK 1, DAY'S PARK ADDITION, being the alley between 35th Avenue Southwest and 34th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Kenyon Street to Southwest Holden Street; by paving the same; by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary, providing for the necessary surface drainage.
